doc.field: N.Y. GRAIN FREIGHTS - April 9 Nidera took TBN 12,000 tonnes HSS Toledo to Casablanca April 29-May 5 25.00 dlrs three days load 1,000 discharge Comanav took Radnik 20,000 tonnes Lakehead to Morocco April 15-25 22.00 dlrs 5,000 load 3,000 discharge Krohn took Akron 75,000 tonnes anygrains on 55 feet stowage Mississippi River to Rotterdam May 1-10 8.05 dlrs 12 days all purposes Continental took Legionario 40,000 tonnes River Plate to Japan April 25-May 10 22.50 dlrs 2,000 load 5,000 free discharge Garnac took Sokorri 30,000 tonnes U.S. Gulf to Constanza April 15-25 17.00 dlrs load terms unknown 3,000 discharge reuter
